title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.18 - Town of Clifton
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.18 - Town of Clifton

State Regulations
(a) CR 50. The
northbound and southbound roadways of CR 50 between the intersection of Route 3
and the intersection of CR 109, a distance of 4.2+- miles, are designated as an
access highway for use by 48-foot long, 102-inch wide trailers and are not
hereby designated as an access highway for any other types of
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8140.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
